name: 2GeThere
description:
The goal of the game is to bring people closer while playing. In today's society people feel lonelier each day. This game is about playing together with a friend or family in the same computer, where you can share laughs and have a good time together.

The challenges may be a bit difficult in multiplayer, so you have to communicate and have a very good timing. We also made a singleplayer mode for those those who prefer to play alone, but remember that the focus of the game is co-op.

The game is still a work in progress, so this is just a trial version of the game for you guys to try the first level. In the future there may be many more features. Try to play the downloadable version for better performance.

Any suggestions, bugs, or complains, please send an e-mail to twogethere_demo@hotmail.com.

We hope you enjoy. :)

The team:

Diogo Magalhães - Programming
Lucas Cerqueira - Programming
Guilherme Santos - Game Design / 3D modeling
Hugo Gomes - Programming
Matheus Ribeiro - Scripting / Translation
Rafael Giordanno - Music / Sound Design
